title: ERP Adapter Profile
description: Schema for defining a single ERP adapter profile that references external capabilities

generatedCapabilitiesNamespace.description: The namespace for generated capability classes (must match the capabilities file)

generatedInterfacesNamespace.description: The namespace for generated interface definitions (must match the capabilities file)

capabilitiesFile.description: Optional path to the capabilities definition file for reference

name.description: The name of the adapter profile (e.g., 'ViewpointVista')

targetNamespace.description: The namespace where the adapter class will be generated

targetClassName.description: The name of the adapter class that will be generated

supportedCapabilities.description: List of capability names that this adapter supports

items.description: Name of a capability defined in the referenced capabilities file
